title: Nerf Yi
body: yi's damage is game breaking and stupid, i got a pentakill with him when i first started playing league. Sure, people can argue that he's squishy, but lets see you kill a yi with bloodrazor, bloodthirster, BoRK, GA, Berserkers Greaves, and Phantom Dancer. Not to mention hes a 450 champ so for that price you are buying one of the most simple and most op champs in the game

replies.body: Let any champ farm and wait for them to kill you. Iswydt.
He's simple -> Easy to master -> Easy to stomp people with that don't know how to fight or kite or buy {{item:3123}} {{item:3165}}

Lol, no. He is completely useless, what he needs is buffs and a full rework.
The problem with yi is that bad players dont know how to handle him, so buffing him to a point of being good enough to actually play makes bronze Vs cry.

Honestly, saying we should nerf yi is like saying we should nerf kat, the rework to her is gonna make her take some skill to play, or at least a little bit a thought, shes not as braindead as she used to be thats for sure, hes already been changed a number of times and hes in a pretty good spot where he isn't to op or to weak.
